recipesJson.name: Aussie Fairy Queer Mother (Peach Raspberry Pavlova Ice Cream)
recipesJson.author: QueerYourVape
recipesJson.description:
We've mixed this as a team effort on SaturDIY'ing with friends on Fresh03's show : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4jT7KEObERo  and it turned out sweetly successful !

FA Almond = Used at 0.25% it is here to act as a separation between all the flavor profiles in complex recipes. Thank you JJarvis.

WF Candy Stick Candy/FA Meringue = Together it makes the pavlova's meringue, thank you James and Shyndo for thinking of this on the spot.

FLV Parsimmon/FA Armenia (Apricot)/FA White Peach = is a derivative of the Leilani maneuver for a beautiful and tasty peach !

INW Raspberry/FLV Red Raspberry = This on is my maneuver for a bright and authentic raspberry. Just give it a couple days...

Thank you to Leilani, JJarvis, James Rivera and Shyndo for all the maneuvers !!!

We are definitely fairyfied on this one !

Enjoy, be queer and vape on !

[Photo credit: www.realfood.tesco.com ]

pageContext.name: Aussie Fairy Queer Mother (Peach Raspberry Pavlova Ice Cream)
